attributes.action: Recognise a national Donald Trump day in Great Britain
attributes.additional_details: The behaviour in America and what we call the civilised western world has been absolutely disgusting in the wake of Donald Trump becoming president of the United States. He won his place as president fair and square, the people of America have spoken. As our greatest alias we should be behind Donald Trump and respect his decisions regarding his country's national security.
attributes.background: This so Great Britain can lead the way in the world and make up for all the embarrassing anti Donald Trump protests. Donald Trump has nothing but Americas interest at heart and should be recognised and commended for it, not vilified.

rejection.details: We're not sure how you would like this day to be marked in the UK. If you would like it to be a bank holiday, we could accept a petition asking for that. If not, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to mark the day.
